name: Shrine Statue: "Seirai Ward"
description: The statue, which can be seen near Asase Shrine in Seirai Island, resembles a giant cat, but there are some indistinguishable features that give this statue a different kind of majesty.\nSome ancient books and light novels believe in the unverified folklore and call this statue "Komainu," identifying it as a divine beast with great power. Neko, "Provisional Head Priestess of the Asase Shrine" is extremely puzzled by this: "A cat is a cat. Do mortals not recognize a cat just because it's adorned, meow?"
